mapper.select: SELECT a.iboard, a.isubject, a.title, a.contents, b.nm, a.created_at createdAt FROM board a INNER JOIN user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE a.iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(isubject, iuser, title, contents) VALUES (#{isubject}, #{iuser}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.select: SELECT itag, NAME FROM tag WHERE NAME LIKE('%${tag}%')
